com.turn.ttorrent.client

Class TorrentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turn.ttorrent.client.TorrentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TorrentMetadataProvider, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TorrentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements TorrentMetadataProvider, java.io.Closeable
    A torrent shared by the BitTorrent client.

    The TorrentHandler class associates a SwarmHandler and a TrackerHandler with all the data and logic required by the BitTorrent client implementation.

    Note: this implementation currently only supports single-file torrents.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.turn.ttorrent.tracker.client.TorrentMetadataProvider

        Create a new shared torrent from meta-info binary data.
        Parameters:
        torrent - The meta-info byte data.
        destDir - The destination directory or location of the torrent files.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the torrent file location or destination directory does not exist and can't be created.
        java.io.IOException - If the torrent file cannot be read or decoded.

      • TorrentHandler

        public TorrentHandler(@Nonnull
              Client client,
              @Nonnull
              Torrent torrent,
              @Nonnull
              java.io.File destDir)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new shared torrent from a base Torrent object.

        This will recreate a SharedTorrent object from the provided Torrent object's encoded meta-info data.

        Parameters:
        torrent - The Torrent object.
        destDir - The destination directory or location of the torrent files.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the torrent file location or destination directory does not exist and can't be created.
        java.io.IOException - If the torrent file cannot be read or decoded.

      • getCompletion

        public float getCompletion()
        Return the completion percentage of this torrent.

        This is computed from the number of completed pieces divided by the number of pieces in this torrent, times 100.

      • getMaxUploadRate

        Parameters:

      • info

        public void info(boolean verbose)
        Display information about the BitTorrent client state.

        This emits an information line in the log about this client's state. It includes the number of choked peers, number of connected peers, number of known peers, information about the torrent availability and completion and current transmission rates.

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Finalize the download of this torrent.

        This realizes the final, pre-seeding phase actions on this torrent, which usually consists in putting the torrent data in their final form and at their target location.

        This call is idempotent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        ByteStorage.finish()
